I installed by downloading http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl and install.

Python version: Python 2.7.13 |Anaconda 4.3.1 (64-bit)| (default, Dec 20 2016, 23:09:15)

The error is quite random. Sometimes it occurs in tens of iterations, sometimes hundreds.

body:
I installed by downloading http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl and install. 

shape is (24,81).

system:Linux  2.6.32_1-16-0-0
Python version: Python 2.7.13 |Anaconda 4.3.1 (64-bit)| (default, Dec 20 2016, 23:09:15) 

The error is quite random. Sometimes it occurs in tens of iterations, sometimes hundreds.
